subject: Your forgot password request
body:
{{header}}

Hey {{name}},

Forgot your password? No worries‚Äîwe've got you covered! Just click the link below to reset your password and get back to using Weam in no time.

 
Reset Password
 

For security reasons, this link will expire in 24 hours. If you didn't request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email‚Äîyour account is still secure.

subject: You're Invited to Join Weam!
body:
{{header}}

Hey,

{{name}} has invited you to join your team on Weam, the ultimate AI-powered collaboration platform!

Weam makes it easy for teams to work together, create custom AI bots, share prompts, and streamline productivity‚Äîall in one place.

To get started, just accept your invitation here:

Accept Invitation
 

Once you sign up, you'll get access to your team's Shared Brain where you can collaborate with the team, save prompts, and explore ready-to-use AI tools. You'll also have your own Private Brain for personal work.

{{footer}}

subject: Request for Additional Storage
body:
{{header}}

Hey {{company_admin_name}},

Heads up! {{username}} has run out of document storage on their Weam account and is requesting more space to upload additional documents.

To ensure they can continue collaborating smoothly with the team, you may want to review the storage allocation or upgrade your team's plan.

{{footer}}

subject: Your Password Has Been Reset
body:
{{header}}

Hey {{name}},

Your password has been reset successfully! üéâ You're all set to log in and continue using Weam.

If this password reset wasn't initiated by you, please contact our support team immediately to ensure the security of your account.

 
Log In to Weam Now
 
{{footer}}

subject: Welcome to Weam!
body:
{{header}}

Hey {{name}},

Welcome to Weam! üéâ We're excited to have you on board as you begin your journey toward seamless AI collaboration for your team.

You're all set with a 30-day free trial to explore everything Weam has to offer‚Äîno strings attached. Start leveraging powerful agents and curated prompts to boost your team‚Äôs productivity today.

Here's a quick guide to help you get started:

You can even import your existing chats from ChatGPT or Anthropic‚Äîno need to worry about losing your past work.

1. Explore Your Shared Brain:
Each team has a Shared Brain where you can save prompts, create custom AI bots, and collaborate with your team in real-time. It's all organized in one place so everyone stays on the same page.

2. Connect with Agents & Prompts:
Build and use powerful AI agents tailored to your workflows, and tap into a growing library of curated prompts to save time and stay efficient.

3. Ready-to-Use Templates:
Get a head start! Check out our library of pre-built prompt and bot templates designed to help your team boost productivity instantly.

4. Private Brain (Just for You!):
You also have a Private Brain‚Äîa space to store your personal prompts and bots, separate from the team's workspace.

To dive right in, log into your dashboard:

{{footer}}

subject: Requesting more users
body:
{{header}}

Hey,

We are so glad you want to share Weam with everyone on your team.

Our support team will reach out to you via email in the next 24 hours to understand your user requirements and process your request.

Weam is evolving as we speak. Soon this process will be so much simpler. We truly appreciate your patience.

{{footer}}

subject: Welcome to Weam! Verify Your Account
body:
{{header}}

Hi there!

Welcome to Weam, your all-in-one AI adaptation platform for teams! We're excited to have you on board.

With Weam, you can collaborate seamlessly with your team, chat with AI, save prompts, and create custom bots‚Äîall within a shared or private space. Access multiple generative AI models like ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, and Llama without separate subscriptions, and track your team's AI adoption for smooth onboarding.

To get started, please verify your account by clicking the button below. This link will expire in 60 minutes.

Verify Your Account
 
 

If you're having trouble with the button, click here for support

Happy collaborating!

Best,

The Weam Team

{{footer}}

subject: Verify Your Account ‚Äì Resend Verification Link
body:
{{header}}

We noticed that you requested to resend your email verification link. To complete the registration process and activate your account, please verify your email address by clicking the button below:

Verify Your Account
 
 

If you're having trouble with the button, click here for support

Happy collaborating!

Best,

The Weam Team

{{footer}}

subject: Welcome to Weam! Your Subscription is Live
body:
{{header}}

Hi {{name}},

Thank you for choosing Weam! We‚Äôre excited to welcome you to a platform designed to make team collaboration with AI simple, productive, and fun.

Here‚Äôs what you can do with your new subscription:

  • Work Together Smarter: Collaborate in real time with AI, work on shared documents, save prompts for your team, and create custom bots‚Äîall in one place.
  • Stay Organized: Keep all chats, prompts, and bots neatly stored in your team‚Äôs Shared Brain. You can even have private brains just for yourself.
  • Leverage the Best AI Models: Enjoy access to leading generative AI models like ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, and Llama‚Äîwithout needing separate subscriptions for each.

We‚Äôve also included a collection of ready-to-use templates to help your team get started quickly and maximize your AI experience.

If you have questions or need help, our friendly support team is here to assist you.

We‚Äôre thrilled to have you onboard and can‚Äôt wait to see the amazing things your team will create with Weam!

Best,
The Weam Team

{{footer}}

subject: Payment Confirmed! Your Weam Plan is Upgraded
body:
{{header}}

Hi {{name}},

Great news‚Äîyour Weam plan has been successfully upgraded! Thank you for your payment.

Here‚Äôs what this means for you and your team:

  • All-in-One Collaboration: Work seamlessly with your team to chat with AI, co-create documents, and design custom bots‚Äîall while staying organized in your team‚Äôs Shared Brain.
  • Full AI Coverage: Connect with top-tier AI models like ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, and Llama‚Äîall in one platform without needing multiple subscriptions.
  • Track AI Adoption: Monitor how your team is adapting to generative AI. See which groups are thriving and identify where support might be needed.

And don‚Äôt forget to check out our templates for prompts and bots to make your experience even better!

If you need assistance or have any questions, we‚Äôre here to help. Thank you for being a part of the Weam community‚Äîwe‚Äôre excited to help your team do incredible things with AI.

Best,
The Weam Team

{{footer}}
